definition: Bruce Lee (1940-1973), Hong Kong actor and martial arts expert
plum
surname Li
small/tiny/few/young
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long

sentences.english: Ding Pei's in relation to Bruce's untimely death.
sentences.chinese: 究竟李小龍的猝死，跟丁佩可有任何關係？

sentences.english: I thought I could be the next Bruce Lee.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得自己能成爲李小龍二。

sentences.english: With his lean body and perfect physique, who could do a better job of imitating Bruce Lee?
sentences.chinese: 以權相宇的完美身材，有誰能比他演的更像李小龍呢？

sentences.english: Today would have been Bruce Lee's 70th birthday.
sentences.chinese: 今天是功夫明星李小龍的70誕辰。

sentences.english: When I grew up, I always looked up to Bruce Lee.
sentences.chinese: 當我逐漸成長時，我一直很尊敬李小龍。

sentences.english: Get into his world and try to understand what Bruce Lee is about.
sentences.chinese: 進入他的世界，試着瞭解李小龍是什麼。

sentences.english: It is Bruce Lee's an only personal monograph before death.
sentences.chinese: 這是李小龍死亡前唯一的個人專着。

sentences.english: Bruce Lee's two-inch punch is a famous example of this.
sentences.chinese: 李小龍的貼身發力功夫就是最好的例子。

sentences.english: Bashiok: Bruce Lee would not use a shield, and neither would the monk.
sentences.chinese: 李小龍不會使用一個的盾牌，武僧也不會。

sentences.english: This side of Bruce Lee is not working, he as usual act wildly.
sentences.chinese: 此方對李小龍則不靈，他照常撒野。

sentences.english: Bruce Lee KO Jackie Chan in "Enter the Dragon" (in slow motion).
sentences.chinese: “龍爭虎鬥”中李小龍擊倒成龍的慢鏡片段。

sentences.english: Bruce Lee really kicks-butt in his movies.
sentences.chinese: 李小龍在他的電影裏真的很棒。

sentences.english: Interpreter and Tongji bridge engineering student Li Xiaolong. His name translates as 'Little Dragon'.
sentences.chinese: 同濟大學橋樑專業學生，也是我們的翻譯李小龍。

sentences.english: I want to build lean muscles just like Bruce Lee.
sentences.chinese: 我想練出像李小龍那樣精實的肌肉。
